titles.title: Jesus I Love Thee Evermore (easy regal nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus I love Thee evermore For Thou hast loved me Lord before I have no freedom but to be A willing slave dear Lord to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let memory then no thought retain Except the glory of Thy reign Nor let my mind desire below Aught but the love of Christ to know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I cannot have a wish or thought Except to love Thee as I ought What by Thy gracious gift is mine With joy I freely make it Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From Thee I have to Thee I give In Thy commands oh let me live My wants will then be all supplied For all are only dreams beside{/lang-eng}
